## Getting and Cleaning Data
 
To create a tidy data set simply

- Run:    `run_analysis.R`
- Script assumes data has been downloaded and that we are working in a directory containing folder/data set
- Output: `tidy.txt` 

## Getting more info

Read the Codebook contained the [CookBook.md](https://github.com/WFSalinas/GettingAndCleaningDataProject/blob/master/Codebook.md)
file.
